message: I'm sitting at work, waiting for one damn report from Accounting so I can go home. (I'm sick) I'm too tired to think of a question...so just discuss whatever. :P
I don't have an iPad and I'm curious if Apple can add anything new that will make me want one :D
@blogkitten how about "What do you think of the iPad 2?" since that's the big tech thing today?
Tim has an iPad...they're neat...but I wouldn't buy one myself. :)
Me either! iMovie? *snore*  My iPod Touch can do most of what I want in an iOS device.

I told myself I'd never own an iPad unless someone bought me one. My last company bought me one, and I ended up finding so many uses for it. I barely use my laptop anymore. I take the damn thing everywhere.
